version_description: Minor Bug Fixes.

This update contains bug fixes and stability improvements.

Following issues have been fixed:
- Not able to download files.
- Not able to open uploaded documents.
- Application crashed when open driving licence and vehicle registration details.
- PAN card is not opening.
- Not showing correct RC.
- Application stuck on the launch page and doesn't open.

This wouldn't be possible without your feedback. If you run into any issues please give your feedback on the DigiLocker App Store page.

- New Refresh button for each document in Issued Documents screen lets you to fetch and update your downloaded document.
- New View button for each document in Issued Documents screen lets you to access downloaded documents in offline mode.
- New Refresh button in Uploaded Documents screen lets you to reload your documents from the DigiLocker.
- Resolves an issue in which uploaded documents are not opening.
- Resolves an issue in which latest Aadhaar card is not downloading.
- Resolves issues in Driving Licence and Registration Certificate.
- Additional bug fixes and stability improvements.

- Introduced eSign feature to digitally sign your uploaded documents from DigiLocker
- Additional bug fixes and stability improvements.

Included following updates:

- Added feature to share comments on Facebook, Twitter and via email.
- Added menu to Rate the App and to report issue to DigiLocker customer care.
- Users will now be able to access Forgot Password, FAQ, Contact us and About us right from the app.

1. Fixed Aadhaar Card formatting issue
2. Fixed Login issue
3. Bug Fixes and optimizations

1. Fixed issue in creating account.
2. Bug Fixes and optimizations.

1. Fixed Login Issues
2. Fixed SignUp Issues
3. Added feature to upload documents to DigiLocker application from other application.
Bug fixes related to login

1. Supports caching of Driving License, Vehicle Registration, Pan and Aadhaar for offline access
2. Fixed duplicate issued document issue.
3. Fixed missing Aadhaar Link button for new users on Issued Document screen.
4. Some performance improvements.
5. Supports Retry option for Login and SignUp process in case of timeout.
6. Added feature to show progress of document upload and to upload failed documents again.

- Fixed crash issue while fetching Aadhaar card.
- Other minor bug fixes.

What’s New:
1. Minor bug fixes.
2. Update for new SSL certificate.
- minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

What’s New:
1. Minor bug fixes.
2. Update for new SSL certificate.

Bug fixes and optimisations.
UI Changes

-Fixed the issue in refresh option of an issued document.
-Added help option in menu, sign in and sign up.
-Some UI changes.
Fixed - User interface issue with Dark Theme.

1. Improved Sign in and Sign up flow
2. Minor bug fixes

2. New notification functionality
